content: in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * 2 times 12 rounds 15-19 single_crochet in each st 12 round 20 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet in next st repeat from * 5 times 18 rounds 21-25 single_crochet in each st 18 round 26 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * 5 times 24 rounds 27-31 single_crochet in each st 24 round 32 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * 5 times 30 rounds 33-37 single_crochet in each st 30 round 38 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from * 5 times 36 round 39 with single_crochet single_crochet in each st 36 round 40 single_crochet through front loop of each st 36 rounds 41-42 lp st in each st 36 fasten_off with long tail cid 13 c 2008-2010 freshstitches all rights reserved this pattern and items made from this patternareforpersonaluseonly andmaynotbedistributedorsoldwithoutwrittenconsent 10 howie the holiday penguin foldbrimofhatupwardsatround40 the rowoffrontloopstitcheswillhelpthebrim turn andtheloopswillnowbeontheright side thread long tail through tapestry needle and whipstitch last round to round 36 of hat tieknotwhenfinished andweaveinends with spare piece of yarn attach hat to top of penguin s body at this point weave in ends congrats you now have an adorable holiday penguin cid 13 c 2008-2010 freshstitches all rights reserved this pattern and items made from this patternareforpersonaluseonly andmaynotbedistributedorsoldwithoutwrittenconsent
